item.description:
The South Shore chapter of he John Birch Society will host a presentation on the global warning fraud. The presentation will be conducted by Elijah Childs, a Boston native, who attendedthe 2009 Climate Change Conference in New York as a reporter for "The New American."

He has conducted this presentation throughout the region,more recently t the Boston Baptist College in Hyde Park. Mr. Childs will review the science, the fraud, thefolks behind the fraud, the reasons and what can be done to expose the fraud.
item.how_to_find_us: We will use the meting room downstairs
item.name: An expose onthe global warming fraud
